text: Michael Gibbons (born 15 May 1995) is a professional Australian rules footballer playing for the Carlton Football Club in the Australian Football League (AFL). He was recruited from Williamstown after he won two J J Liston Trophys, the best and fairest in the VFL. == Early life & junior career == Gibbons began his football journey with Lavington (NSW) before playing under 18 football in the TAC Cup with the Murray Bushrangers. Overlooked in the draft he moved to Melbourne to further develop his game. The versatile midfield-forward spent five years at Williamstown in the VFL. In that time, he became a dual J.J Liston Medal winner and Norm Goss Medallist in the 2015 VFL Grand Final. http://www.williamstownfc.com.au/news/10-latest-news/1246-draft- me-michael-gibbons == AFL career == === Carlton (2019-present) === Gibbons was recruited by Carlton as a supplemental rookie recruit in February 2019. https://www.carltonfc.com.au/news/2019-02-08/blues-sign-gibbons-and-cottrell He made his senior debut later that month in the opening game of the season against Richmond, and immediately established himself as a regular member of the club's senior team, primarily as a mid-sized forward/midfielder. He missed only three games in his first two seasons, and kicked 27 goals in those years. He signed a one-year extension contract for the Blues for the 2020 season as a rookie, and then signed to the club's senior list at the start of 2021. == Statistics == As of round 1 of the 2020 season |- style="background:#EAEAEA" | scope="row" text-align:center | 2019 | | 40 || 21 || 16 || 14 || 196 || 112 || 308 || 69 || 57 || 0.8 || 0.7 || 9.3 || 5.3 || 14.7 || 3.3 || 2.7 |- | scope="row" text-align:center | 2020 | | 40 || 1 || 0 || 0 || 3 || 4 || 7 || 1 || 0 || 0.0 || 0.0 || 3.0 || 4.0 || 7.0 || 1.0 || 0.0 |- class="sortbottom" ! colspan=3| Career ! 22 ! 16 ! 14 ! 199 ! 116 ! 315 ! 70 ! 57 ! 0.7 ! 0.6 ! 9.0 ! 5.3 ! 14.3 ! 3.2 ! 2.6 |} ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Carlton Football Club players Category:Williamstown Football Club players Category:Australian rules footballers from New South Wales
